title: Hand to Foot
description: Forward bends, Inversions, Standing Primary body parts engaged Calves, Lower Back, Neck & Upper Traps, Shoulders, Spine Stretches wrists and backs of legs Stimulates abdominal organs How to perform Hand To Foot Stand with your feet hip distance wide and parallel. Bend forward from your hips with an exhale. Lengthen your torso as you come down. Lift your toes and tuck your palms underneath your feet all the way up to your wrists. Press your toes into the heels of your hands. Lift your sit bones toward the sky and let your head hang.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
